text: Jeon Jung-kook (born September 1, 1997) is a South Korean singer, dancer and rapper. He is also better known mononymously as Jungkook. He is known for being a member of the South Korean boy group BTS. == Career == === 2013-present: BTS === On June 12, 2013, Jungkook released his first album as a member of BTS. Since their debut, Jungkook has been credited as the main producer for two of their songs: "Love is Not Over" and "Magic Shop". ==References== Category:1997 births Category:BTS members Category:Hybe Corporation artists Category:K-pop singers Category:Living people Category:South Korean record producers Category:South Korean singer- songwriters Category:People from Busan
title: Jungkook
